title: Readers Sing Praises of Trees Big and Small
sub_head: Trees are wonderfully therapeutic, and that can apply whether the trees are monumental or miniature.
body:
A behemoth banyan can provide “The Benefits of a Tree Friend” (Personal Journal, June 16) and so can a bitty bonsai. Bonsai is a venerable and ancient art in which strong images of powerful trees are replicated in miniature, growing in shallow pots. I find relaxing pleasure in watering and eyeing my many 8-to-12-inch bonsai trees every day. Occasionally, after lengthy observation, I adjust the setting of one ever so slightly or gently clip a nub of errant twig.
Trees are wonderfully therapeutic, and that can apply whether the trees are monumental or miniature.
Al Donner
Orinda, Calif.
